2. Loan duration is longer than 50% of all cases in the bank - Longer durations typically indicate higher risk, but not conclusive alone.

4. Saving account is low balance - Indicates limited financial reserves.
5. Present employment is between 1 year to 4 years - This shows some stability but might be less secure than longer periods.
